name.description: The profile's name. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

path.description: Path in which to create the profile.

role.description: The role name to include in the profile.

arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS to the instance profile.

create_date.description: The creation timestamp of the instance profile.

path.description: The path of the instance profile in IAM.

role.description: The role assigned to the instance profile.

roles.description: The list of roles assigned to the instance profile. (**Deprecated**)
